questName: May Katma be with you III
shortDescription: Unlock PvP.  Get some basic defenses to Aspen's base.
longDescription: With the Mini-Fortress and Vault Hardening you have the ability to scout local areas.

rewardData.description: Katma [<color=cyan>Bonus Quests</color>] unlocked.  Look deep to uncover the many mysteries ahead.

dialogueData.text: Lets get ready to clear out the cat tree and more of those parts
Lets build a [<color=cyan>Mini-Fortress</color>] and engage more missions.
